items.title: How to Read Financial Statements:  Build Financial Literacy.
items.headline: Read financial statements and speak the language of business without the drudgery  of a traditional accounting course

Explain what is the balance sheet equation and why the balance sheet equation is the foundational model for accrual accounting/double entry accounting
